text:
<|prompt|>Generate a UI component like Marquee<|completion|>{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "marquee",
  "type": "registry:ui",
  "title": "Marquee",
  "description": "Search for a command to run...",
  "files": [
    {
      "path": "registry/magicui/marquee.tsx",
      "content": "import{ Marquee }from\"@/components/magicui/marquee\";",
      "type": "registry:ui",
      "target": "components/magicui/marquee.tsx"
    }
  ]
}<|endoftext|>

<|prompt|>Generate a UI component like 3D Card Effect<|completion|>{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "3d-card-effect",
  "type": "registry:ui",
  "title": "3D Card Effect",
  "description": "A card perspective effect, hover over the card to elevate card elements.",
  "files": [
    {
      "path": "registry/aceternity/3d card effect.tsx",
      "content": "npx shadcn@latest add https://ui.aceternity.com/registry/3d-card.jsonCopy",
      "type": "registry:ui",
      "target": "components/aceternity/3d card effect.tsx"
    }
  ]
}<|endoftext|>

<|prompt|>Generate a UI component like 3D MarqueeNew<|completion|>{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "3d-marqueenew",
  "type": "registry:ui",
  "title": "3D MarqueeNew",
  "description": "A 3D Marquee effect with grid, good for showcasing testimonials and hero sections",
  "files": [
    {
      "path": "registry/aceternity/3d marqueenew.tsx",
      "content": "npm i motion clsx tailwind-mergeCopy",
      "type": "registry:ui",
      "target": "components/aceternity/3d marqueenew.tsx"
    }
  ]
}<|endoftext|>

<|prompt|>Generate a UI component like 3D Pin<|completion|>{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "3d-pin",
  "type": "registry:ui",
  "title": "3D Pin",
  "description": "A gradient pin that animates on hover, perfect for product links.",
  "files": [
    {
      "path": "registry/aceternity/3d pin.tsx",
      "content": "npm i motion clsx tailwind-mergeCopy",
      "type": "registry:ui",
      "target": "components/aceternity/3d pin.tsx"
    }
  ]
}<|endoftext|>
